Package xyz.rk0cc.willpub.pubspec.data

Class Pubspec

java.lang.Object
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.pubspec.data.Pubspec
public final class Pubspec extends Object
A mutable object structure to match with pubspec.yaml.
This object is trying to replicate the field form pubspec.yaml and can be modified under JVM. And integrated validator to validate each inserted field is following the documentation. The source of Pubspec can be from constructor, mapper's reader, or immutable snapshot.
It accepted additional field data to allow assigning deprecated or platform unique field like flutter or executable which less commonly uses but still recognized by pub. Therefore, no validation available for additionalData().
Since:
1.0.0
See Also:
  • PubspecSnapshot
  • "The pubspec file" from dart.dev

  • Constructor Details

    • Pubspec

      public Pubspec(@Nonnull String name, @Nonnull PubspecEnvironment environment, @Nullable SemVer version, @Nullable String publishTo, @Nullable String description, @Nullable URL homepage, @Nullable URL repository, @Nullable URL issueTracker, @Nullable URL documentation, @Nullable ImportedReferenceSet dependencies, @Nullable ImportedReferenceSet devDependencies, @Nullable OverrideReferenceSet dependencyOverrides, @Nullable PubspecPlatforms platforms, @Nullable Map<String,Object> additionalData) throws IllegalPubPackageNamingException
      Create Pubspec data with all field provides.
      Parameters:
      name - Package name (mandatory)
      environment - Package environment preference (mandatory)
      version - Package version
      publishTo - Specify where package published, null as default and "none" if this package is not consider publishing.
      description - Description of the package, when need to be published, it must between 60 and 180 characters in a String.
      homepage - Package's homepage if applied.
      repository - Package's repository if applied.
      issueTracker - Package's issue page. If omitted and the repository field is pointing to GitHub, it uses /issues from repository URL on pub.dev.
      documentation - Package's documentation page for providing more detailed reference of this package.
      dependencies - A set of reference that is going to uses in this package.
      devDependencies - A set of reference which only uses during testing.
      dependencyOverrides - A set to specify reference will be applied in package's own pubspec.
      platforms - Specify which platform can be supported. (Apply null equals with all platforms supported.)
      additionalData - A Map containing fields which not mentioned in Pubspec.
      Throws:
      IllegalPubPackageNamingException - If name does not meet requirement of package naming.

    • Pubspec

      public Pubspec(@Nonnull String name, @Nonnull PubspecEnvironment environment) throws IllegalPubPackageNamingException
      Create new Pubspec with mandatory fields only. And any non-mandatory field set as null (except publishTo() which will be assigned as "none").
      Parameters:
      name - Package name.
      environment - Package environment.
      Throws:
      IllegalPubPackageNamingException - If name does not meet requirement of package naming.

    • appendAdditionalData

      public boolean appendAdditionalData(@Nonnull String key, @Nullable Object value)
      Append value if key is not defined before.
      Parameters:
      key - Additional field name.
      value - Additional value which can be reference to JSON.
      Returns:
      true if appended.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If key is referencing any provided field in Pubspec.
      See Also:
      • modifyAdditionalData(String, Object)
      • Map.putIfAbsent(Object, Object)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if removed successfully form additional data.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If key is referencing any provided field in Pubspec.

    • name

      @Nonnull public String name()
      A package name to recognize from various of packages in pub repositories.
      Returns:
      A String of package name.

    • environment

      @Nonnull public PubspecEnvironment environment()
      Indicate environment that to make package worked.
      Returns:
      A Dart environment required when imported by other packages.

    • version

      @Nullable public SemVer version()
      A package version assigned for this package.
      It can be null if the package is not consider publishing.
      Returns:
      Current version of this package (if applied).

    • description

      @Nullable public String description()
      Describe the package function in few words to others.
      Returns:
      Description of this package.

    • publishTo

      @Nullable public String publishTo()
      Specify another repository to publish the package, if it set to be null, it reference to official repository in most cases and "none" if not decided to publish this package.
      Returns:
      A repository location that using to publish this package.

    • homepage

      @Nullable public URL homepage()
      Location of package's homepage (if applied).
      Returns:
      Package homepage URL.

      Location of package's repository (if applied).

      Returns:

      @Nullable public URL documentation()
      Location of package documentation (if applied).
      Returns:
      Package's documentation URL.

    • dependencies

      @Nonnull public ImportedReferenceSet dependencies()
      Manage the dependencies are used in this package.
      This package is mutable and attached with Pubspec. And can be cloned if not using to modify existed dependencies.
      Returns:
      An ImportedReferenceSet which contains dependencies uses on this package.

    • devDependencies

      @Nonnull public ImportedReferenceSet devDependencies()
      Manage the dependencies are used in this package during development
      This package is mutable and attached with Pubspec. And can be cloned if not using to modify existed dependencies.
      Returns:
      An ImportedReferenceSet which contains dependencies uses for development only on this package.

    • dependencyOverrides

      @Nonnull public OverrideReferenceSet dependencyOverrides()
      Specify which dependencies will be overridden on this Pubspec.
      This package is mutable and attached with Pubspec. And can be cloned if not using to modify existed dependencies.
      Returns:
      An OverrideReferenceSet which containing dependencies will be used instead of using from dependencies() and devDependencies() in package's own pubspec.

    • platforms

      @Nonnull public PubspecPlatforms platforms()

    • containsKeyInAdditionalData

      public boolean containsKeyInAdditionalData(@Nonnull String key)
      Check the key is assigned in additional data already.
      Parameters:
      key - A String of the field name.
      Returns:
      true if contains.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If key is referencing any provided field in Pubspec.
      See Also:
      • Map.containsKey(Object)

    • additionalDataValue

      @Nullable public Object additionalDataValue(@Nonnull String key)
      Return a value which comes form additional data.
      Parameters:
      key - Name of additional field.
      Returns:
      Value which assigned on this key.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If key is referencing any provided field in Pubspec.
      See Also:
      • Map.get(Object)

    • additionalData

      @Nonnull public Map<String,Object> additionalData()
      Return entire Map of additional data applied in Pubspec.
      To prevent unexpected type applied directly via Map, the returned Map is unmodifiable.
      Returns:
      An unmodifiable map representing any data which does not provide setter and getter in Pubspec.

    • clearAllAdditionalData

      public void clearAllAdditionalData()
      Purge all assigned additional data.
      See Also:
      • Map.clear()

    • isFlutterProject

      public static boolean isFlutterProject(@Nonnull Pubspec pubspec)
      Determine this is a Flutter project instead of ordinary Dart project.
      If this is Flutter project, it changes how to invoke pub commands in JVM.
      Parameters:
      pubspec - A Pubspec for inspecting structure.
      Returns:
      true if either PubspecEnvironment.flutter() is non-null or contains flutter under additionalData().
